collector:Contemplate.NAME: Contemplate
collector:Contemplate.DESCRIPTION: Put a random card from your Collection into your hand.

collector:SoulSnare.NAME: Soul Snare
collector:SoulSnare.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL If the enemy dies this turn, collector:Collect it.
collector:SoulSnare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL If the enemy dies this turn or next, collector:Collect it.

collector:Enfeeble.NAME: Enfeeble
collector:Enfeeble.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak and 1 Vulnerable. NL Draw a card.
collector:Enfeeble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak and 1 Vulnerable. NL Draw !M! cards.

collector:Extricate.NAME: Extricate
collector:Extricate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If the enemy is collector:Afflicted, gain !B! Block.

collector:SpiritLeech.NAME: Spirit Leech
collector:SpiritLeech.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is collector:Afflicted, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

collector:ThornWhip.NAME: Thorn Whip
collector:ThornWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL collector:Kindling - collector:Order twice.

collector:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
collector:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Deal !D! damage, then increase this card's damage by !M!.

collector:FairTrade.NAME: Fair Trade
collector:FairTrade.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Gain [E] and draw !M! card from the *Collect pile.

collector:PlatePact.NAME: Plate Pact
collector:PlatePact.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL collector:Order - *Torchhead attacks a random enemy. Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

collector:SpiritWave.NAME: Spirit Wave
collector:SpiritWave.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL *Torchhead heals !M! HP. NL Draw 2 cards.

collector:WaveOfMalice.NAME: Wave of Malice
collector:WaveOfMalice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL collector:Afflicted enemies.
